thread.title: These Magical Ice Cream Flowers All Over Instagram
thread.title_full: These Magical Ice Cream Flowers Are All Over Instagram

author: Michelle No
title: These Magical Ice Cream Flowers All Over Instagram
text:
View this image ›
Carsey-Werner Productions ID: 10427555 2. And TBH, all I want is a bouquet of ice cream flowers: View this image ›
foodfanatic / Via instagram.com Ice cream roses > real roses.
ID: 10428545 3. Cauldron Ice Cream in Santa Ana, California is serving up edible ice cream flowers — and they’re a ~thing of beauty~. View this image ›
peppermintpattikins / Via instagram.com The ice creams cost $4.50 for a small cone with a single scoop, or $8 for a large cone with three scoops . Though the store has been serving their ice cream creations since 2015, the recent addition of a Red Velvet Puffle as well as flavors like Rose and Sun, Moon, & Stars (a combination of oolong, jasmine, and green tea) have renewed its Insta glory.
ID: 10426791 4. Each order is served in a warm, eggy waffle cone called a “puffle” — or a puffy waffle — first popularized in Hong Kong. View this image ›
snaptaste 10426808 5. The cone is then filled with extra-creamy liquid nitrogen ice cream. View this image ›
pobleats 10426836 6. Cauldron’s menu of flavors changes monthly, but recent creations have included Rose, Earl Grey Lavender, and Sea Salted Caramel Crunch. View this image ›
thedevouringlion 10426823 7. Depending on your order, your ice cream may even be topped with a drizzle of honey, toasted marshmallow fluff, or sea salt. View this image ›
briireynoso 10426931 8. This one is mint chip ice cream served in a churro puffle cone View this image ›
stirandstyle 10426939 9. And just like roses, you don’t need a S.O. to buy you a bouquet. View this image ›
theirregularlens / Via instagram.com (Just a ticket to Orange County, California )
ID: 10426968 10. *books tickets* View this image ›
VH1 ID: 10428976
